co.uk.niadel.mpi.common

Class MPIEventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.MPIEventHandler

  • public class MPIEventHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for IThrowable and the more Forge-esque utilities. Is also a reference implementation of an Event Handler.
    Author:
    Niadel
